00159   long long convertToTimeType(std::string date) {
00160     if(date.size()==0 || 
00161         // For mysql, the empty date is 0000-00-00, not empty, need this test to avoid problem in ptime
00162         date.find("0000-00-00")!=std::string::npos) {
00163       return 0;
00164     }
00165 
00166     boost::posix_time::ptime pt(time_from_string(date));
00167     boost::posix_time::ptime epoch(boost::gregorian::date(1970,1,1));
00168     time_duration::sec_type time = (pt - epoch).total_seconds();
00169 
00170     return (long long) time_t(time);
00171 
00172   }

00180   void checkUserId(std::string userId) {
00181     std::string sqlUserRequest = "SELECT userid from users where userid='"+userId+"'";
00182     boost::scoped_ptr<DatabaseResult> user(mdatabaseVishnu->getResult(sqlUserRequest.c_str()));
00183     if(user->getNbTuples()==0) {
00184       throw UMSVishnuException(ERRCODE_UNKNOWN_USERID);
00185     }

00246   void checkStatus(const int& status) {
00247     if((status < 0) || (status > 1)) {
00248       throw UMSVishnuException(ERRCODE_UNKNOWN_OPTION, "Invalid Status value: its value must be 0 or 1");
00249     }

00258     if((closePolicy < 0) || (closePolicy > 2)) {
00259       throw UMSVishnuException(ERRCODE_UNKNOWN_CLOSURE_MODE, "Invalid ClosePolicy value: its value must be 0, 1 or 2");
